Career Profile

I started my career as a Scientist. I completed my Ph.D. in Chemistry between Australia and Ireland. Academia is a tough job market and I decided to switch career. That’s how I ended up in tech and eventually moved into Analytical roles and programming. Nowadays, I spend my free time learning about programming and trading both equities and option contracts.
